meta.job_title: Hydrogen Refueling System Supply Chain Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and implement material control, procurement, expediting, and warehousing activities for engineered equipment, systems, and materials in support of project execution.
Lead the use of advanced planning tools to model, simulate, and release optimized material plans, and align with commercial teams to maintain inventory requirements.
Coordinate activities of assigned Material Management specialists and provide accurate, timely records of material status.
Evaluate and improve material management and control activities, analyze forecasts, and recommend necessary corrective action.
Develop and implement coordinated detailed solutions to drive continued innovation, efficiency, and safety for material planning.

Adhere to and support Health, Safety, Environmental, and Sustainability Policies, as well as support corporate initiatives promoting safety, diversity, ethical behavior, increased employee engagement, and career development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management or a relevant discipline (Master’s degree desired)
APICS certifications preferred: CPIM or CSCP
Experience in SAP (PP, MM, APO, SNP or PPDS) or related ERP system
